sentences.en: A composed delegate calls the two delegates it was composed from.
sentences.cn: 组合的委托可调用组成它的那两个委托.

sentences.en: A delegate instance may encapsulate either static or instance method.
sentences.cn: 委托实例可以封装静态或实例方法.

sentences.en: A good manager knows when to delegate.
sentences.cn: 一个好的经理知道何时该放权。

sentences.en: Always check a delegate for null before invoking it.
sentences.cn: 调用前始终检查委托是否为空.

sentences.en: Around 350 delegates attended the conference.
sentences.cn: 大约有350名代表参加了大会。

sentences.en: Delegate and event are two vital elements of C #.
sentences.cn: 介绍C # 言的两个核心元素委托和事件,探讨其语义和内部实现原理.

sentences.en: Delegate B : Huh. I work for Teledyne . What company are you with?
sentences.cn: 啊, 我在德立台公司做事. 您在那个公司高就?

sentences.en: Delegate types also provide a binary + operator, which performs delegate concatenation.
sentences.cn: 委托类型也提供二元+运算符, 该运算符执行委托串联.

sentences.en: He can and should delegate tactical responsibility.
sentences.cn: 他应负战术上的责任.

sentences.en: He plans to delegate more authority to his deputies.
sentences.cn: 他打算把更多的权力交给副手。

sentences.en: He talks of travelling less, and delegating more authority to his deputies.
sentences.cn: 他说要减少旅行，还有要授予他的副手们更多的权力。

sentences.en: Horton's Achilles heel was that he could not delegate.
sentences.cn: 霍顿的软肋在于他不懂得放权。

sentences.en: It may be more cost - effective to delegate or outsource.
sentences.cn: 也许把这项工作委派或外包给别人是更加划算的.

sentences.en: It must decide whether to delegate authority to subsidiaries or centralize.
sentences.cn: 它必须决定是委授权力给公司,还是采取集中办法.

sentences.en: It takes experience to judge correctly how much power should be delegated.
sentences.cn: 应该下放多少权力需要靠经验来准确判断。

sentences.en: Many employers find it hard to delegate.
sentences.cn: 许多雇主觉得很难下放权力。

sentences.en: Officials have now been delegated to start work on a draft settlement.
sentences.cn: 官员们现已被委派开始准备一份拟定协议。

sentences.en: The voters delegate their authority to these officials.
sentences.cn: 选民把他们的权力授与这些官员.

sentences.en: There is, however , one department which they do not delegate - namely, the department of backbiting and scandal.
sentences.cn: 此外, 还有他们不愿意参与的部门, 那就是诽谤造谣的机构.

sentences.en: Very Strong ability to organize and delegate work for others.
sentences.cn: 组织及分配工作的能力突出.

words.tran_cn: 代表团；代表的地位；代表制度；代表的派遣

trans.tran_en: someone who has been elected or chosen to speak, vote, or take decisions for a group
to choose someone to do a particular job, or to be a representative of a group, organization etc

trans.tran_cn: 委派…为代表； 授， 把…委托给
trans.tran_en: to choose someone to do a particular job, or to be a representative of a group, organization etc
